name: determine-churn-risk
inputSchema: {"type": "object", "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-07/schema#", "required": ["ticket", "analysis", "summary"], "properties": {"ticket": {"type": "object", "required": ["id", "description": "Indicators of customer emotions"}, "satisfaction_indicators": {"type": "array", "items": {"type": "string"}, "description": "Indicators of customer satisfaction"}}, "additionalProperties": false}}, "additionalProperties": false}
